Principal Investigators


Our principal investigators for this project are:


  1. Cindy Cheng, Hochschule für Politik at the Technical University of Munich
  2. Robert Kubinec, New York University Abu Dhabi

Our previous (Co-)Principal investigators for this project were:


  1. Luca Messerschmidt, Hochschule für Politik at the Technical University of Munich
  2. Joan Barceló, New York University Abu Dhabi
  3. Vanja Grujic, Universidade de Brasília
  4. Allison Spencer Hartnett, University of Southern California
  5. Timothy A. Model, Havighurst Fellow at the Miami University
  6. Caress Schenk, Nazarbayev University
  7. Svanhildur Thorvaldsdottir, Hochschule für Politik at the Technical University of Munich



Research Assistants


Research assistants identified information on government policies made in response to COVID-19 from various sources and document them following the procedures and classification scheme outlined in the CoronaNet Codebook. We acknowledge and are deeply grateful for the research assistants who contributed to collecting data for this project:

Partner Universites and Institutions







CoronaNet is part of the PERISCOPE consortium, a project funded by the European Commission under the Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation programme (agreement no. 101016233)
